name: Avoid using hexadecimal constants in mainframes

platformMigration.description:
EBCDIC which stands for the Extended Binary Coded Decimal Interchange Code, is an 8 bit character encoding used on IBM mainframes and AS/400s. List of all the EBCIDIC characters to be checked is the following link column 2(h):

http://ascii-table.com/ebcdic-table.php

EBCIDIC charcters should be detected and converted in order to support Open Source platforms.
